description: Microsoft has released the optional KB5045594 preview cumulative update for Windows 10 22H2 with fixes for problems printing to multi-function printers and other issues. [...]
title: Windows 10 KB5045594 update fixes multi-function printer bugs

description: Multiple popular mobile applications for iOS and Android come with hardcoded, unencrypted credentials for cloud services like Amazon Web Services (AWS) and Microsoft Azure Blob Storage, exposing user data and source code to security breaches. [...]
title: AWS, Azure auth keys found in Android and iOS apps used by millions

description: The SEC has charged four companies—Unisys Corp, Avaya Holdings, Check Point Software, and Mimecast—for allegedly misleading investors about the impact of their breaches during the massive 2020 SolarWinds Orion hack. [...]
title: SEC charges tech companies for downplaying SolarWinds breaches

description: Proof-of-concept exploit code is now public for a vulnerability in Microsoft's Remote Registry client that could be used to take control of a Windows domain by downgrading the security of the authentication process. [...]
title: Exploit released for new Windows Server "WinReg" NTLM Relay attack

description: VMware has released another security update for CVE-2024-38812, a critical VMware vCenter Server remote code execution vulnerability that was not correctly fixed in the first patch from September 2024. [...]
title: VMware fixes bad patch for critical vCenter Server RCE flaw
